description: This PHP source file provides a web interface for viewing and downloading troubleshooting logs, including system, event, and firewall logs, with dynamic filtering by log type and time frame. It includes embedded JavaScript for dynamic content loading and user interactions.

methods.name: adjust_acs_tb
methods.description: Adjusts table headers and assigns appropriate IDs and classes for accessibility and styling, based on provided column headers.

methods.name: ajaxDo
methods.description: Performs an AJAX request to load log data for the specified mode and time frame, and populates the corresponding HTML table.
